Text: starts up on no$gba and looks fine
Works perfectly on Desmume. No piracy-safes triggered, which Atlus is so fond of. Thank you very much.

To make it work on No$GBA download this and place it in the No$GBA main folder. To make the link work remove the = sign between Word and Press.
http://setya5785.word=press.com/2008/01/02/nds-bios-and-firmware/
Now open No$Zoomer and go to: "Options > No$GBA Settings" and set "Reset/Startup Entrypoint" to "GBA BIOS (Nintendo Logo)"
Now Save Settings and restart No$Zoomer, that's it.
